explanation: [0-0] The video starts with an outdoor setting, sunny, and a person's right hand holding two small blue balls, fingers pinched together. There are buildings and a swimming pool in the background.

[0-6] Then the fingers continuously open and close, forming the shape of a mouth, and then the small balls turn over to reveal black eyes. As the hand keeps moving, it arrives in front of a mini fountain, placing the hand on the water column. The hand, along with the continuous impact of the water column, is rushed into the air and then disappears from the right side of the screen. The scene switches to space, with planets and a black sky in the background.
